reviews.Title: Excellent
reviews.Comment:
Samsung Galaxy S24 is an outstanding smartphone that impresses with its AI advanced features and sleek design. From the moment I picked it up, I could feel the premium quality of the materials and the attention to detail in every aspect of the device.

reviews.Title: Best in the market!
reviews.Comment: Very bright and good display, speakers are loud , performance and camera is awesome. I love the telephoto lens, it's soo good. I'm coming from iPhone and this is the perfect product. Battery life max 4.30 hrs - 5hrs SOT. Sometimes the phone do get warm by doing simple task, it seems some kind of AI processing is being performed in the background, it's not happening everytime only some time. Overall I'm happy with product

reviews.Title: Value-for-money
reviews.Comment:
I have upgraded from samsung galaxy s20 fe to this phone. This is grear in all the parameters. It gives close to reality photos in all portrait, ultrawide and night light shots. Capturing nature with this phone camera helps keep your memories in hand
Zooming is good upto 3x. It has all the AI features as of the recent updates.
Compared to my previous phone this mobile is lighter and compact. Easy to hold for long time usage..
The performance on multitasking is also appreciable..

reviews.Title: Decent product
reviews.Comment:
Phone form factor and camera are excellent.
Major drawbacks are the heating issue when using camera and the faster battery drain.
These may be attributed to the Samsung's Exynos processor's inferior performance. Potential buyers of this phone can buy the S23 instead or wait for the Galaxy S25 which will sport the latest Snapdragon processor which will solve both the drawbacks. S25 is rumoured to be launched in Jan 2025.

reviews.Comment:
Using this little samsung device for the last 5 days!
It feels premium by the look and fill. Nobody can make better displays than samsung, full marks for the display.
Bettery and camera is decent, was expecting better out of it.
Performance wise is its fine, through im not heavy user.

I faced network issues twice while the 5G was on, and I had to put the phone on flight mode to resolve it.

reviews.Title: Terrific purchase
reviews.Comment: Best phone in this price even I compared camera quality with I phone 15 plus and google pixel 7 pro and I phone 15 plus is getting 3rd no in all 3 phones. So guyzz winner is here #samsung s24 gray colour.... go for it without any doubt......

reviews.Title: Classy product
reviews.Comment: The Samsung Galaxy S24's camera system is outstanding, capturing stunning photos and videos. The premium build and vibrant display offer an excellent user experience. The battery life is impressive, with fast charging capabilities. The One UI software is user-friendly and customizable. However, the high price may be a concern for some buyers. Overall, it's a top-performing smartphone that exceeds expectations.

reviews.Title: Fabulous!
reviews.Comment: The phone's aesthetics are exceptional; however, battery life is a significant drawback.

reviews.Title: Simply awesome
reviews.Comment: great color, delivery person also helped a lot in setting up new phone

reviews.Title: Classy product
reviews.Comment: It's definitely worth buying.

reviews.Title: Simply awesome
reviews.Comment: Battery is doing good after update and after using some time as it understands usage patterns in initial days after that it works fine. Camera is easily the best in this price segment.

reviews.Title: Brilliant
reviews.Comment: Was looking for a compact sized phone. Earlier I was using s22 plus but it had a poor battery life. Upgraded to s24 and currently I am getting very good battery life as per my smartphone usage. About phone, black colour is always my favourite. Display is nice and crisp. Camera is awesome. Haven't seen any heating issues yet. One notable thing is that very precise haptic feedback.

reviews.Title: Unsatisfactory
reviews.Comment: There was a free wireless charger with this phone but seller didn't sent,battery draining very fast big battery issue
